scripts.build: rm -rf dist/js/elm.* && elm make src/Main.elm --output dist/js/elm.js && rsync -ai --delete assets/css/ dist/css/
scripts.compress: closure-compiler --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in ECMASCRIPT5 --js dist/js/elm.js > dist/js/elm.min.js && gzip -fk dist/*s/* && ls -lhS dist/*s
